text:
Radioactive materials may emit a-particles or B-particles.

Which statement about the effect of these emissions is correct?

A

Both a-particles and B-particles cause the nucleus to change into that of a different chemical
element.

Neither a-particles nor B-particles cause the nucleus to change into that of a different
chemical element.

Only a-particles cause the nucleus to change into that of a different chemical element.

Only B-particles cause the nucleus to change into that of a different chemical element.

from S.A thin sheet of paper is placed as shown in the diagram.
